testcase.name: HappyPath, Purchase 2 Items
testcase.system-out: Given login into automation practice........................................passed And Quick view an item......................................................passed And Change the size of the item.............................................passed And Add that item to your baske.............................................passed And Continue shopping.......................................................passed And Quick view a different item (leave the size at the default..............passed And Add that item to your basket............................................passed When View the basket and confirm that the items are of the size you selected, that their prices are correct, that Total Products is the sum of the two items and that ‘Total’ equals the Total Products + Shipping.passed Then Proceed through checkout to payment (complete by wire).................passed And Logout from automation practice.........................................passed

testcase.name: REVIEW PREVIOUS ORDERS AND ADD A MESSAGE
testcase.system-out: Given login into automation practice........................................passed And View previous orders....................................................passed When Select an item from your previous order (there will be others – confirm this by date/time) and add a comment.passed Then Confirm that the comment appears under ‘messages’......................passed
